Lets access internal.ironcorp.me subdomain ‚è¨

internal.ironcorp.me:11025 403 Error

Now lets access another subdomain ‚è¨

admin.ironcorp.me:11025 Page

Lets brute-force the Username and password with Hydra Tool üîΩ

1

hydra -l admin -P /usr/share/wordlists/seclists/Passwords/xato-net-10-million-passwords-10000.txt admin.ironcorp.me -s 11025 http-head -I

Hydra Tool

After Login I get this page üîª

Search query

SSRF Vulnerability ‚è¨

I looked for SSRF vulnerability and it is indeed SSRF I verified it like this üîΩ

SSRF response that can access local server file

So lets access the 403 Error subdomain with this may be I could able to open it through this ‚è¨

SSRF vulnerability and opened the subdomain page in it

On click here I got this redirected page :

Username Equinox

When I try to search any thing through name parameter I get appended to the Name like this üîΩ

So I tried to use separator as () in between of commands like this üîΩ

Command Injection

Lets use our Burpsuite Tool that will intercept the request and I can modify its queries easy also , So I decided to upload php_reverse_shell.php file with certutil Tool in this system .

Certutil Tool worked successfully

Lets get the reverse shell now üîΩ

Lets look for root.txt as I was enumerating I was resticted to enter into some directories like Admin, SuperAdmin directories so I suspected that the root.txt file must be inside these directories so I checked there permissions üîª

I am Administrator Now !!
